Reviews.Title: I love it !
Reviews.Author: pollapat suriyawong
Reviews.Content: After a lot of research on the internet for cheaply priced smartphones I saw this listing on Amazon.com.I was a bit skeptical to buy this product  as I couldn’t believe I could get a good Android smartphone in the market for this price.My apprehensions were wrong from the moment the phone came out of the box.I could download all my favorite apps  with an easy user friendly set up and the 8GIGS memory was more than handy.I inserted my Tmobile simcard and set up was instantThe screen has pleasant colors  and good touch response.Wifi is easily set up and fairly quickThis may not be a fancy phone like the samsung galaxy but a reasonably efficient one and a great product for those on a budget wanting to own an android smartphone!

Reviews.Title: Edit #2 Phone Died. Never worked well for more than a week. Wasted effort
Reviews.Author: Curtis Khan
Reviews.Content: Update 24th Nov.2013Phone works much more reliably and faster now. After sales support much improved and the seller stands by his product. If it holds up it would have been more than worth the priceI wasn't expecting a great phone. But I did expect a reliable phone. This phone is slow. The camera is at best bad and the sound is "tinny." The seller sent an email promising excellent after sales support. However after one email to him with a very generic comment, I can't get a response from him. The phone freezes and sometimes I get a white screen that forces me to do a hard reset. I guess I got what I paid for

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: peter
Reviews.Content: Phone is great size of screen is excelent for viewing pictures and videos easy to use key boards anddial keys

Reviews.Title: this phone did not work
Reviews.Author: Keisha asay
Reviews.Content: This phone didn't work. It didn't have service more than half the time. I could never hear anyone. It wouldn't let me set up a voicemail, it couldn't receive picture messages, it had a hard time receiving regular texts, it doesn't stay charged for more than two hours, ect. I could go on for a while. I wouldn't recommend this as a get me by phone, it's a huge waste of money.

Reviews.Title: it's ok
Reviews.Author: EMJ
Reviews.Content: Phone worked great after a lengthy set up , had to call 2 diffrent companys. Still couldent get 3g with net 10 so no netflex . The charge port broke after 4 months, have to charge it by putting a heavy book on charge wire. Not happy but will live with it for now month almost up on net ten then new phone.:-(

Reviews.Title: phone was not what it claimed to be.
Reviews.Author: monkey
Reviews.Content: Had to send it back charger would not charge among other things.and social media wouldn't work not at all thanks.

Reviews.Title: battery issue
Reviews.Author: Flo S.
Reviews.Content: Brought 2 batteries. Thought it was a good sign. Neither of them work properly. The phone sometimes deletes my contacts out of nowhere..... I'll have 100 contacts one minute the next.... Just 4 show up :/ and this is my second one. The other one wouldn't connect to the sim card :/

Reviews.Title: crappy phone
Reviews.Author: timothy walker
Reviews.Content: That phone is some crap to to slow pen don't work keyboard suck don't have enough memory don't waste ur money

Reviews.Title: look at link be fore you buy any kind of phone like this it helps a lot
Reviews.Author: Alexis A.
Reviews.Content: forum.xda-developers/showthread.php?t=2165554 <---- (add http:// at the beginning and . com after developers if I write it their it wont show u the link)\ I found this link after trying 2 find out why my phone acted and had nearly all features of Android 2.2 which it is clearly stated that it runs 4.2.2 error does not do read first its cheap phone but a lot of problems read research be for you buyhelp this post get to the top so more people have the opportunity of knowing more about this phone and others similar to it

Reviews.Title: slow performance
Reviews.Author: muzemil
Reviews.Content: Slow when opening or loading an application.Battery last 3 hr max.Audio not clear, especially when using the speakerphone•

Reviews.Title: Hate it
Reviews.Author: Patrina
Reviews.Content: wen i received the phone i was very excited it was just wat i wanted in a phone but then i realize it had issues. When i was receiving a call the phone was ringing but nuttin coming up on the screen so i miss alot of calls because of this. When i made calls persons complain saying it had an echo in the back ground like i was next to a speaker talkin and it was irrating to them. The charger that came with the phone doesnt charge the phone so i had to try other alternatives to get the phone charge. I downloaded facebook and some other apps but they keep cutting off and the screen was going white and resetting by itself.  This was a waste of money 2 me i might as well did pay lots of money for a galaxy s4

Reviews.Title: Bad Phone
Reviews.Author: Richard Mensah
Reviews.Content: I wish I never bought this phone it does work well from the day one I received. If I had paid attention to the other people comment I wouldn't have wasted my money by buying this phone as now am not using the phone.

Reviews.Title: NOT Bad
Reviews.Author: Reina Garcia
Reviews.Content: Not bad for a generic brand brings extra battery for more battery life also comes with own little wallet  like I said  not bad for a generic brand  .

Reviews.Title: poor
Reviews.Author: Kb
Reviews.Content: the it self is nice but the quality of the hardware is terrible dont buy this phone its a rip off.

Reviews.Title: not Happy with phone
Reviews.Author: lisa matthews
Reviews.Content: was not really sold on this phone it would not stay connected to the internet was getting kicked off lot of times,  could not send pics through text messages i went a head and bought another phone that was name brand that i am now a very happy person sorry i guess you could say you get what you pay for :(

Reviews.Title: defective
Reviews.Author: hasani felix
Reviews.Content: didnt read sim didnt read sd card camera was very very bad front cam was better than back.. even for the money this phone is well below a cheap phone from dollar store

Reviews.Title: worse phone ive bought from amazon
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: everything is in Chinese apps took over two days to download and some still wouldn't I have bought many phones from amazon but this one by far is the worse

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: tousssida kabore
Reviews.Content: phone came on time, CS was great, but it just did not work like i expected. First it was really slow unable to download apps and can see calls. When making calls people at the other end can hear noises. I emailed them and they were pretty fast on getting back to me and trying to help me but i just returned it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: Techsavy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone after deliberating for a while as I had previously had a bad experience on purchasing android phones from Amazon.This one turned out to be a winner,Great budget phone.Clear call quality.Easy set up and intallation of apps.Nice colors.Fair camera.Overall great value for price.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Rawle Hussain
Reviews.Content: Below are some of the problems we encountered after 3 days of use.1) Volume low.2) There is always a humming sound when talking.3) All contacts from both sim cards were deleted.4) The phone no longer logs incoming/missed calls.5) Cannot install Whatsapp.

Reviews.Title: Bad product - Will never recommend to my enemy
Reviews.Author: Amircat
Reviews.Content: The product is really not worth your money. Too much headache than how much you want to save from buying genuine Samsung.The phone charging port continue to fail daily and I cannot return the phone because I came a little too late into the window I suppose to returned it.It hold charge like trying to fill a basket with water.You download apps only to find out it'snot playable. Terrible piece of product.

Reviews.Title: Review of lighahead phone
Reviews.Author: Mavis Guy-Charles
Reviews.Content: The phone was overheating the battery was running down in a few minutes and you were unable to make calls. A total fraudulent device. It had to be returned immediately. I am not sure that  I got my refund yet.

Reviews.Title: horrible!
Reviews.Author: hazel95
Reviews.Content: DO NOT buy this phone!!! It is very slow and does not work well at all, also does not get good service.

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: sherry
Reviews.Content: Pieces of s*** this phone is not worth it. Dont waste ur moneybu will be disappointed I was so hurt

Reviews.Title: bad camera
Reviews.Author: Emma Arinze
Reviews.Content: the camera was bad and it glitches a lot. it does not allow certain apps, like SNAPCHAT to work properly

Reviews.Title: bad never buy
Reviews.Author: william cleary
Reviews.Content: It sucks can't do nothing anything with it even call you always hang up on people. I wouldn't even give it one star. You cant download simple apps. It takes forever to load. And also it looks like there is a bug in it. If you are smart don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: nice phone but dont work right
Reviews.Author: glenda filyaw
Reviews.Content: Loved this phone but every time i made a call all you can hear is noise .hated to have to send it back . wish the noise had not have been there

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE PHONE DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Shanna
Reviews.Content: this is a horrible phone, do not waste any money on it. It constantly freezes, crashes and in a generic version. The play store isn't the actual one. I just bought it today. Wont open simple apps like Facebook or any games. Camera is horrible. Flash last like a milisecond, very slow and unreliable, im stuck with this phone until the seller contacts me.  DON'T BUY THIS PHONE WHATEVER YOU DO!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: The Lighthead N9000 (I9500) 5.0" Capactive is not a goog phone
Reviews.Author: Rose H.
Reviews.Content: This phone doesn't work as well as I had hoped.  The a candy crush app doesn't open and other apps doesn't open. Sometimes the phone shutdown on its own. A very poor performance phone.
